code: import axios from'axios';let rooms;let room;let roomTitles=[];const RoomsService={getRooms:async function(){const roomsUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/rooms?per_page=10");await axios.get(roomsUrl).then(response=>{rooms=response.data;});return rooms;},getRoom:async function(roomId){const roomUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/rooms/").concat(roomId);await axios.get(roomUrl).then(response=>{room=response.data;});return room;},getRoomTitles:async function(){const roomsUrl="".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_BASE_URL).concat(process.env.REACT_APP_STARDUST_WP_API,"/rooms?_fields=title");await axios.get(roomsUrl).then(response=>{if(response.data){response.data.forEach(room=>{roomTitles.push({label:room.title.rendered,value:room.title.rendered});});}});return roomTitles;}};export default RoomsService;
